metadata.description: Triqual - Autonomous test automation with documented learning loops, self-healing tests, and MCP-powered pattern learning

plugins.name: triqual-plugin
plugins.description: Autonomous test automation plugin with enforced documentation loops, 5 Opus 4.5 agents (planner, generator, healer, classifier, learner), and seamless MCP integration (Quoth patterns + Exolar analytics). Features blocking hooks, mandatory Quoth pattern search, draft-first development, and persistent learning.

plugins.name: quoth
plugins.description: AI Memory system that gives Claude persistent memory across sessions. Local-first .quoth/ storage, quoth-memory subagent, configurable strictness modes, session logging, and knowledge promotion.
